reviewText: I pull this video out every year to review the fundamentals. I was a self-taught back country (deep snow, no groomed trails) cross country skier for 20 years in Vermont. This video still serves me well as a reminder of the mechanics of this lovely life-long sport. This is the second time I bought this video; I originally bought it several years ago and it was stolen! So, I had to buy it again!
Very informative, but also guaranteed to put me to sleep.  Sorry I have to have a some strong coffee and a redbull chaser to watch this.
